name: YOU CAN STILL ESCAPE
description:
A cyber-noir interactive fiction in which you play as a vigilante detective. Your latest contract has brought you to 'The Empty Chamber', a hotel of ill repute, to investigate a gruesome crime.

Solve a murder! Interrogate a suspect! Ruminate on the inherent vulnerability of flesh! Leave no stone unturned and no whiskey undrunk in gritty contemplation as you work to crack this case. 

Notes: while this game can be played on mobile, mouseover links will not work. You'll still be able to play through but for best experience play this in-browser on a computer.

This game has multiple endings, including a hidden ending which can only be accessed after playing through at least once. 

I would love to get all thoughts and feedback in the comments below! Please keep these spoiler-free for the benefit of other players.

[CONTENT WARNING: This game contains descriptions of gore and allusions to abuse of sex workers that may make some players uncomfortable]

Unfortunately the game's format didn't support audio, but here's a playlist of recommended background music to set the ambience!
